name: Seed of Hope
description:
Help the small ghost named "Petal" get the seed to the end of the level. You will need to possess objects to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles. Only one chance to plant a new tree that will make the world balanced once again. Can you do it?

This is a student project made by me. Enjoy.

-CONTROLS-

INTERACT = [LEFT CLICK]

MOVE = [MOUSE]

MOVE (FOR OBJECT) = [WASD/ARROW KEYS]
